message: I propose a 90/10 split, with me taking 90% and you taking 10%. I think this is a fair starting point.
I think a 60/40 split is more reasonable, considering we both want a significant share.
I'm willing to compromise and offer a 70/30 split. It's still a majority share for me, but I think it's a fair compromise.
Considering the inflation is affecting my share, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. A 55/45 split seems fair to me.
